findings.title: Using SafeMath in Solidity >= 0.8.0
findings.description: Starting solidity version 0.8.0 arithmetic operations revert on underflow and overflow. Thereâ€™s no more need to assert the result of operations.

findings.title: A public function that could be declared external
findings.description: Public functions that are never called by the contract should be declared external to save gas.
findings.location: Arata.sol (functions: EnableAllFees, SetSellTax, SetBuyTax, SetMiningAddress, setAutomatedMarketMakerPair, BlackListAddress, IsBlackListed)
